app.title: Delta CFO Agent
app.tagline: Delta's proprietary self improving AI CFO Agent

revenueSync.title: Revenue Recognition Update:
revenueSync.transactionsMatched: {count} transaction{s} matched to invoices and reclassified as Revenue.

aiSuggestions.title: AI Smart Recommendations
aiSuggestions.noImprovements: No improvements needed! The AI is confident with the current classification.

duplicates.title: Duplicate Transactions Detected
duplicates.overwriteInfo: Deletes old transactions and replaces them with newly processed data using your latest business knowledge and improved Origin/Destination mapping.
duplicates.discardInfo: Cancels the upload and keeps your existing transactions unchanged.

invoiceMatching.title: Invoice Matching Results
invoiceMatching.loadingDescription: Analyzing transactions and invoices to find potential matches...
invoiceMatching.reviewNote: Review each match below and accept or reject based on your assessment.
invoiceMatching.emptyDescription: All invoices are either already matched or have no corresponding transactions.

findDuplicates.title: Duplicate Transaction Detection
findDuplicates.loadingDescription: Analyzing transactions by date, description, and amount...
findDuplicates.reviewNote: Review each group below. You can use checkboxes to select specific transactions or use the bulk actions below.
findDuplicates.emptyDescription: All transactions appear to be unique.

messages.confirmArchive: Are you sure you want to archive the selected transactions?
messages.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this transaction?

revenue.pageSubtitle: Automated invoice-transaction matching with AI intelligence

header.title: Revenue Recognition Dashboard
header.subtitle: Automated invoice-transaction matching with AI intelligence

matching.title: Invoice Matching
matching.description: Automatically find and link invoices to transactions with AI-powered matching.
matching.helpRunMatch: Run Match: Analyze ALL unlinked invoices and find potential transaction matches. This creates pending matches for review.
matching.helpAutoMatch: Auto-Match HIGH: Automatically confirm all high-confidence pending matches (80%+). Use this when you trust the AI's recommendations.

pendingMatches.title: Pending Matches for Review
pendingMatches.emptyDescription: All invoices are either matched or no matches were found. Try running the matching process to find new matches.

unlinkedInvoices.title: Unlinked Invoices Ready for Matching
unlinkedInvoices.emptyDescription: No unlinked invoices found. All invoices have been successfully matched to transactions.
unlinkedInvoices.refreshButton: Refresh to Check for New Invoices
unlinkedInvoices.quickMatchHelp: Use Quick Match to automatically find potential transaction matches.

messages.noSelection: Please select at least one match

messages.confirmDeleteMember: Are you sure you want to delete this workforce member?
messages.confirmDeletePayslip: Are you sure you want to delete this payslip?

filters.title: Report Filters
filters.typeTooltip: External Only: Real business revenue/expenses (recommended for financial reports). All Transactions: Includes internal transfers between accounts (may show imbalanced totals).
filters.allTransactionsWarning: "All Transactions" includes internal transfers which may show imbalanced totals. Use "External Only" for accurate financial reporting.

section.generatePDFInfo: Generate professional financial statements in PDF format
section.sankeyInfo: Interactive Sankey diagram showing money flow between categories

dmpl.title: Statement of Changes in Equity
dmpl.generateButton: Generate Statement of Changes in Equity

charts.sankeyFlowAnalysis: This diagram shows how revenue flows through different expense categories to net profit

transactions.title: Upload Transaction Files (CSV/Excel/PDF)
transactions.dragDrop: Drag & Drop CSV, Excel or PDF Files Here

invoices.title: Upload Invoices
invoices.dragDrop: Drag & drop invoice files here or click to browse
invoices.supportedFormats: Supported formats: PDF, PNG, JPG, JPEG, TIFF, CSV, Excel (XLS/XLSX), ZIP, 7Z (Max 50MB total)
invoices.multipleHint: Upload multiple files, a ZIP archive, or a single invoice

receipts.title: Upload Payment Receipts
receipts.dragDrop: Drag & drop payment receipts here or click to browse
receipts.supportedFormats: Supported formats: PDF, PNG, JPG, JPEG, TIFF, CSV, Excel (XLS/XLSX)
receipts.aiHint: Upload multiple files - AI will automatically match receipts to invoices

customerFilter.label: Filter by Customer (Optional)
customerFilter.hint: Select a customer to improve matching accuracy. Only invoices from this customer will be considered.

empty.title: No files uploaded yet
empty.description: Upload CSV or PDF files above to get started with transaction tracking.

messages.onlyAllowedFormats: Only CSV, Excel (XLS/XLSX) and PDF files are allowed
messages.duplicateDetection: Duplicate detection not fully implemented in hierarchical view yet.

knowledge.title: Tenant Knowledge
knowledge.subtitle: Manage classification patterns, business entities, and AI learning settings

searchPlaceholder.patterns: Search patterns by description, entity, or category...

patternForm.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g., COINBASE or PIX TRANSF or GAS FEE
patternForm.descriptionHint: Enter the keyword or phrase to match. Wildcards are added automatically. Example: "PAYPAL" will match any description containing PAYPAL
patternForm.entityHint: Optional - Leave blank for patterns that don't map to a specific entity
patternForm.categoryNote: Categories are loaded from your actual transaction data in the Transaction Manager
patternForm.subcategoryNote: Subcategories are auto-suggested from your transaction data
patternForm.justificationPlaceholder: e.g., Monthly SaaS subscription, Recurring payment for cloud hosting
patternForm.justificationHint: Standard justification text to apply when this pattern matches a transaction
patternForm.confidenceHint: 0.0 - 1.0 (higher = more confident). Recommended: 0.8+ for exact matches, 0.5-0.7 for partial matches
patternForm.activeHint: Inactive patterns will not be used for classification

entityForm.renameHint: Renaming this entity will update all associated transactions and patterns.
entityForm.mergeWarning: This will merge the current entity into another entity and update all associated transactions. This action cannot be undone!
entityForm.mergeTargetHint: Select the entity to merge into. All transactions will be reassigned to this entity.

settings.title: Classification Settings
settings.minConfidenceHint: Transactions with confidence below this threshold will be flagged for review
settings.autoLearningEnabled: Enabled - Create patterns from manual corrections
settings.autoLearningHint: When enabled, the system will automatically create patterns based on your manual transaction corrections
settings.minOccurrencesHint: Minimum number of identical classifications required before auto-generating a pattern

suggestions.description: After you manually classify the same transaction pattern 50 times, the system automatically suggests creating a classification pattern. Review and approve suggestions below to add them to your active patterns.
